entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.VisualBasic.UnitTests.Semantics.BinaryOperators.TestLargeStringConcatenation is flaky #57806
  • [Proposal] GetAllTypesByMetadataName #57802
    17.1
  • Tab completion in VS2022 not complying with code style #57800
  • Test AsyncIteratorWithAwaitAndYieldAndAwait is flaky #57797
  • Cover additional cases in implicit object creation analyzer #57789
  • Introduce "use implicit array creation" analyzer #57788

Closed

  • CS8602 (dereference of a possible null reference) when using method group, but not when using lambda #57753
  • VS crashes on pasting a specific code snippet into it #57762
  • Disallow a discard assigns to another discard #57791
  • It looks like LocalRewriter.VisitInterpolatedString method assumes that overload resolution necessary picks a Format method that returns string #53005
    17.1
  • InvalidCastException in ValueTracking #57100
    17.1
  • Nullability for [NotNull] input arguments that are assigned #57793
  • 'is not' and [DoesNotReturn] #57798
  • Please expose Compilation.GetBestTypeByMetadataName as a public API #52399
    17.1
  • Stack overflow while binding an InternalsVisibleTo attribute #57742
  • Method inference issue with extension methods that have lamdas as argument when the class implementation contains a method overload with object argument. #57759
  • Update tests for NoneOperation with type #57531
    17.1
  • [LSP] Investigate moving taskcompletionsource to queue item instead of callbacks #57221
    17.1

PullRequests

Created

  • Add missing test for CallerArgumentExpression #57805
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57804
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Remove weakref that telemetry indicates has no impact at all. #57803
    Area-IDE
  • Use the .NET 6.0 SDK for building (Arcade6) #57801
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Change the title of configure severity to resources file #57795
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.1-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #57784
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Fix ValueTracking for index parameters #57727
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Don't throw exceptions for file changes after a project is unloaded #57782
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to features/list-patterns #57754
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to main #57786
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #57785
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57796
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Avoid accessing current assembly identity while reporting an accessibility diagnostics for an inaccessible internal symbol. #57783
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57787
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Fix null ref in navbars #57778
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Load SVsShellDebugger before calling IVsSolution.CreateSolution #57765
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57775
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to main #57774
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Ensure that getting the checksum for a project cone is resilient to its project references being missing #57776
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #57718
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Include a type for NoneOperations in VB, print the type in tests #57664
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Move the task completion source for a queue item into the queue item itself. #57617
    Area-IDE, LSP, Next

Updated

  • Simplify implementation of SourceGeneratedFileItemSource #57691
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #57807
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • BackgroundAnalysisScope enhancements #57172
    Area-Analyzers, Needs UX Triage
  • Address some PROTOTYPE markers #57318
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns
  • Simplify code for producing project-id list #57772
    Area-IDE
  • Run HasRefactoringsAsync out-of-process #40672
    Area-IDE
  • Switch liveshare to use LSP pull diagnostics and cleanup server name usages #57596
    Area-IDE, LSP, UX Review Not Required
  • Update corefx dependencies to 6.0.0 #57732
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Enable dumps for hung tests #57549
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Incremental Generator Work Tracking API Implementation #55469
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.1
  • Allow xml docs to still be created when 'emit metadata only' is on. #57667
    Area-Compilers
  • Add support for nullable analysis in interpolated string handler constructors #57780
    Area-Compilers
  • Switch to 1ES servicing pools on release/dev16.11-vs-deps #57482
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix generator caching in compiler server #57177
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Add new parser/lexer to the StackTraceAnalyzer #57598
    Area-IDE
  • Transform the GeneratorDriver even if the Compilation was GCed #57721
    Area-IDE
  • Use the .NET 6.0 SDK for building (Arcade7) #57637
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Port BasicNavigationBar.CodeSpit to the new test harness #57738
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to features/snappy/nodelay #57755
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Use helpers in param-nullchecking emit #57615
    Area-Compilers
  • Shorten paths in VS installation #57726
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add test from PR 50799 for impl PR 56853 #57752
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Cover additional cases in implicit object creation analyzer #57679
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Ignore function types in return type inference #57713
    Area-Compilers, Needs Shiproom Approval, 17.0
